messages.title: JO SWINSON'S PLAN FOR BRITAIN'S FUTURE!
messages.content: Stop Brexit and invest the £50 billion Remain Bonus in public services and tackling inequality.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fight to stop Brexit and use the £50 billion Remain Bonus to invest in services and tackling inequality.
Build a fairer economy by giving every adult £10,000 to spend on skills & training throughout their lives.
Ensure mental health is treated with the same urgency as physical health.

mentions.tacticalSituation: A vote for Labour could end up being a vote for Brexit. Don't risk it.

issues.brexitEurope: Stop Brexit. A vote for Labour could end up being a vote for Brexit.
issues.economy: Build a fairer economy, give every adult £10,000 to spend on skills & training.
issues.health: Ensure mental health is treated with the same urgency as physical health.

leaflet.personalStatement: Bobby lives locally and understands our area and issues we face every day. Bobby Dean is a champion for our community.

politicalExperience.achievements: Understanding local area and issues faced every day.

endorsements.endorsement: I need Bobby Dean in Parliament to help me Stop Brexit and build a brighter future.

quotes.text: I need Bobby Dean in Parliament to help me Stop Brexit and build a brighter future.

images.caption: Liberal Democrats - Stop Brexit. Build a brighter future.
